sentences.en: Conversely, the broader image � � s denotation is, the narrower image � � s connotation will be.
sentences.cn: 而形象的外延越大其内涵也越大.

sentences.en: Her lot was cast with her head in a narrower pit than her limbs.
sentences.cn: 她的命运与她的头脑一起被抛进了比她的身躯还狭窄的掩体.

sentences.en: It will be wider and narrower of the east - west borders.
sentences.cn: 这将是广泛和东西部边界窄.

sentences.en: Knit the next two stitches together to make the garment narrower.
sentences.cn: 下两针织在一起,把衣服弄瘦点儿.

sentences.en: Narrower and wider letters are respectively called condensed and extended.
sentences.cn: 窄体字母和宽体字母,分别称作长体字和扁体字.

sentences.en: Now the term GMMA has compressed and become narrower.
sentences.cn: 现在,顾比复合移动平均线长期组已经收缩并变得更窄.

sentences.en: Test 4 : AP box, float ( narrower than container . ) OK.
sentences.cn: 绝对 定位框,浮动框 ( 小于容器 ) 正常.

sentences.en: The base region is always very much narrower than the emitter or collector regions.
sentences.cn: 基极总是比发射极和集电极薄得多.

sentences.en: The creek became narrower and finally petered out.
sentences.cn: 支流越变越窄最后终于枯竭了.

sentences.en: The jacket is shaped ( ie becomes narrower ) at the waist.
sentences.cn: 这件外衣腰部很贴身 ( 较窄 ).

sentences.en: The narrower bearings required less distance to develop full width films.
sentences.cn: 狭轴承只需要较短的距离就能产生全宽度润滑膜.

sentences.en: The narrower the range, the greater the chance that it will be breached.
sentences.cn: 幅度越小, 突破它的机会越大.

sentences.en: The team found their pregnant subjects'airways tended to be narrower.
sentences.cn: 研究小组发现,其怀孕受测对象的气管往往较窄.

sentences.en: This room is twice the length of the other, but much narrower.
sentences.cn: 这个房间的长度是那个房间的两倍, 但窄得多.

sentences.en: We have taller buildings, but shorter tempers; wider freeways, but narrower viewpoints.
sentences.cn: 我们有更高的建筑物, 但较短的脾气; 高速公路更广泛, 但狭窄的观点.

trans.tran_cn: 狭隘的( narrow的比较级 )，狭窄的，（种类或数目）有限的，狭义的
